    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
     
    Config
    Interface defining methods for configuration management.
    ContentPanel
     
    DashScreen
     
    DragDropButton
     
    Extractor
    Interface for file extractors that define methods for extracting content from compressed files.
    ExtractorZip
    This class implements the Extractor interface for handling the extraction of ZIP files.
    FileManager
    This class provides a facade for file management utilities and extractors.
    FileUtility
    This utility class provides various file management functions, such as creating folders, deleting files and directories, moving files, and retrieving directory contents.
    JavaCompilerService
    This class provides a service for compiling Java source files using the system's Java compiler.
    JavaCompilerUtil
    Utility class for compiling Java classes from a given folder path, with the option to specify the package name.
    JavaFileProcessor
    Utility class for processing Java files, including finding Java files in a directory and modifying their package declarations.
    JavaJudge
    The JavaJudge class extends the Judge class and provides functionality for judging Java programming assignments.
    JavaTestRunner
    The JavaTestRunner class is responsible for loading test classes and submission classes, and then executing the tests against the corresponding submission classes.
    Judge
    Abstract base class that provides the structure for judging Java programming assignments.
    JudgeButtonPanel
     
    JudgeScreen
     
    JudgingClassLoader
    The JudgingClassLoader class is responsible for loading test and submission classes from the specified directory paths.
    Kurohitsugi
    Main entry point of the application, responsible for loading necessary services, initializing UI components, and displaying the main dashboard screen after loading the required components.
    PDFGenerator
    Class responsible for generating a PDF report containing feedback on a student's assignment.
    ProcessLog
     
    ProcessLogIterator
     
    ProcessLogPublisher
     
    ProcessLogSubscriber
     
    Screen
     
    SplashScreen
     
    Student
     
    Style
    Style class implements the Config interface to manage configuration settings related to style.
    StyleKey
    Enum representing style-related configuration keys.
    Submission
    Represents a student's submission for a programming assignment.
    SubmissionManager
    Manages a collection of submissions, providing functionality to add, retrieve, and filter submissions by their status.
    SubmissionManager.SubmissionIterator
    Internal iterator class to traverse submissions based on a specific status filter.
    TestExecutor
    The TestExecutor class is responsible for running JUnit test classes using the JUnit Platform.
    TestResultListener
    The TestResultListener class implements the TestExecutionListener interface to listen for the completion of test executions.
